segments.text: I look at the woman, focused on that plate as if it's the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron are neat, yet the scene around her is anything but.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are completely oblivious to the danger of their actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy stretching to reach the cookie jar, and I can feel my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? The stool looks like it might tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, her arm up, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their excitement seems so innocent, yet it’s reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so oblivious to what’s happening right behind her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a slow-motion disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
